abstract: The nation’s largest cable company reported results for the last quarter before it took control of NBCUniversal.
snippet: The nation’s largest cable company reported results for the last quarter before it took control of NBCUniversal.
lead_paragraph: The Comcast Corporation, the largest cable company in the United States, reported Wednesday that its revenue rose 7 percent in the fourth quarter, its last before taking control of NBC Universal.

headline.main: Comcast Posts 7% Rise in Revenue as Subscribers Buy Bigger Cable Packages
headline.print_headline: Comcast Posts 7% Rise in Revenue as Subscribers Buy Bigger Cable Packages
